title: A Kids Book About Racism
description: “You see, some people believe that having different color skin means you aren’t as good as others. That’s called racism.”Yes, this really is a kids book about racism. Inside, you’ll find a clear description of what racism is, how it makes people feel when they experience it, and how to spot it when it happens. This is one conversation that’s never too early to start, and this book was written to be an introduction for kids on the topic.
author: Jelani Memory
